ANIMATEOTHERS.LABEL: Animate others' tokens
ANIMATEOTHERS.HINT: Allow users to animate tokens they do not own

COLLAPSEHEADERBUTTON.LABEL: Collapse application header button
COLLAPSEHEADERBUTTON.HINT:
If enabled, will hide the text label for the header button, reducing the space that the button takes up.
NOTE: Only affects applications that use ApplicationV1.
